citations.narrative:
Four feeders were observed to have moldy food in the corners of the containers. When asked about the cleaning
procedures, the licensee stated the feeders hadn't been cleaned and sanitized in a little over two weeks. Moldy food can
cause illness in the dogs. All feeders must be sanitized every two weeks or more often as necessary to prevent mold from
developing on the food. Correct starting on 8/7/24.
Note: The licensee corrected this during inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End of report.
n

narrative:
3.9(b) 
   
Feeding 
Four feeders were observed to have moldy food in the corners of the containers. When asked about the cleaning 
procedures, the licensee stated the feeders hadn't been cleaned and sanitized in a little over two weeks. Moldy food can 
cause illness in the dogs. All feeders must be sanitized every two weeks or more often as necessary to prevent mold from 
developing on the food. Correct starting on 8/7/24. 
 
Note: The licensee corrected this during inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End of report. 
 
 n
